ygData.subject: Re: You are all wrong
ygData.msgSnippet: * SNIP * Are you just a stupid ass fuck?  I am so sick and tired of all these crybabies who has raised up one character to level 12 and thinks their class is
ygData.messageBody:
* SNIP *


Are you just a stupid ass fuck? I am so sick and tired of all these
crybabies who has raised up one character to level 12 and thinks their class
is underpowered. All your facts are so screwed up.


* SNIP *

You know how I said you seemed to be a reasonable debater? I take it back. All
of us here are having a discussion, which involves different viewpoints. I
don't think the guy you're responding to deserves this kind of personal attack.

Defend your views with your intellect, not your ego.

BTW, I assume that most everyone here is quite experienced and has multiple
characters. I would also assume that most of us have been with EQ since beta
(B3 for me), and that exploring a possible character change doesn't amount to
being a 'crybaby'.

We all agree that being bound in non-city locations is what we want, and that
Bards don't need bind.

Golias, Solusek Ro
